We are also holding the next Reform UK branch meeting as scheduled in New Romney. The details are as follows:
Date: TUESDAY 22 APRIL, 2025
Venue:
New Romney Bowls Club
Sussex Rd, New Romney TN28 8HL
Time: 7pm – 9pm (approx)
Meetings in the Romney Marsh area are normally lively and fun. And a chance to meet new friends with similar common sense views. It would be great to see you there. Do feel free to invite friends and family.
As always, your support in person at any event is very much appreciated. And as some of us are suffering from tired feet and blisters, if you do feel like a bit of last minute campaigning (e.g. leafleting your street) please reach out to your local candidate directly. Their contacts details are:
Romney Marsh – David Wimble – alliedents@aol.com
Cheriton, Sandgate & Hythe East – Gary Burton – gary@wolftransport.co.uk
Folkestone East – Mary Lawes – marylawes57@ntlworld.com
Folkestone West – John Baker – mail@countyhardware.com
Hythe West – Peter Osborne – osbr1@aol.com
If you are not sure about the boundaries between the KCC divisions please check out this set of helpful maps.
Finally, tickets for the Gala Dinner on Saturday 14 June 2025 are selling fast and if you would like to attend please enquire soon. At the time of writing there is still plenty of capacity for the afternoon conference. Details of both events can be found at www.reformfh.co.uk.
Best wishes as always
Bill Wright
Reform UK Branch Chairman, Folkestone, Hythe & Romney Marsh
